document.full_text: china and south korea announced on monday they will toughen checks of japanese food for radioactivity, hours after the world health organization said the detection of radiation in some food in japan was a more serious problem than it had expected.
document.title: who sees japan food safety situation as "serious"
lines_and_colors: china and south korea announced on monday they will toughen checks of japanese food for radioactivity, hours after the world health organization said the detection of radiation in some food in japan was a more serious problem than it had expected.
